title: Im still waiting!

embed.description: Close Ask a question about League or Riot, and we'll try to answer it. Answers go live every Thursday at 1:30 pm (PT) Log in to Ask Riot Thank you for submitting a question! Deep-dives on vision score, Yasuo's ban rate, and how we find voice over talent.

body:
Dont think we've forgotten that you said you'd change Yasuo!

If you had to update Azir, I'm going to take Yas with me.
You cant get out of it just by making all the other champs higher priority bans because of the new runes.

Im waiting.

replies.body:
>"the designer who did the Azir rework is conducting the Swain train now."

But hey

>Aurelion Sol
>Voice of Light (R) cooldown lowered from 120/100/80 to 110/90/70

Omg yes I agree, I’m actually a lvl 7 yas but I agree he’s wayyyy op becasue of his 2x crit passive, it means he can itemise into other AD times etc. U should need to earn the crit somehow, and same with his shield.

I feel like they need to decide what Yas actually is. Is he an assassin? Or is he a fighter?

If he is an assassin, he needs to only have access to his crit in short bursts. So he can burst down squishies, but not have sustained damage to destroy tanks.

if he is a fighter, he needs a harsher penalty on his crit, but have crit available for longer,  so he can't burst down squishes instantly, but can hold his own against tanks.
